name: Snake Legends
description:
Play the classic old-school snake game, now in 3D! Snake Legends is one of the most innovative and original snake games for mobile. Choose among 3 different controller types to control your snake and get it bigger and bigger. Snake Legends has amazing new features: you can unlock new characters to play with (you can even choose one to lead your snake!!!), interact with different power-ups, and compete with your friends!

In Snake Legends, you can use the different power ups to shorten your snake and have an easier game. Get Snowflakes to slow down your snake. Use the Lightning Bolt to electrocute the last character on your snake, or use Bombs to take out several characters at the same time; be careful though, DON’T KILL THE LEADER or it is game over!

Gather all the money you can, including the big, crazy, jumping 50 dollar Bill and use it to spin your luck and get new random characters.

What are you waiting for? Download the best snake 3D game now!

Features:
- Over 80 characters and more coming soon.
- Classic snake game.
- Amazing power ups to help you out.
- Excellent gameplay.
- Nice sounds and music.
- Lots of fun!
